languages.text: "Вас окружают невыносимо тяжелые цвета, мастер ван Калокс... Словно их зачерпнули из глубокого забытого колодца. Это... из-за Черного корабля, так ведь?"
"You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"
languages.original_text: "Вас окружают невыносимо тяжелые цвета, мастер ван Калокс... Словно их зачерпнули из глубокого забытого колодца. Это... из-за Черного корабля, так ведь?"

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师，你包裹在难以忍受的沉重色彩之中……那些色彩就仿佛是从某个被遗忘的深井里吸出来的一样。这……是因为那艘黑船，是吗？”
languages.original_text: "You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师，你包裹在难以忍受的沉重色彩之中……那些色彩就仿佛是从某个被遗忘的深井里吸出来的一样。这……是因为那艘黑船，是吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les couleurs qui vous entourent sont particulièrement denses, maître van Calox... Comme si elles avaient été tirées à grand-peine d'un puits insondable. Serait-ce... à cause du Vaisseau Noir ? »
languages.original_text: "You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: « Les couleurs qui vous entourent sont particulièrement denses, maître van Calox... Comme si elles avaient été tirées à grand-peine d'un puits insondable. Serait-ce... à cause du Vaisseau Noir ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Le rodean colores tremendamente pesados, maestro van Calox... Es como si los hubieran sacado de las profundidades de un pozo olvidado. Es... por la nave negra, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: «Le rodean colores tremendamente pesados, maestro van Calox... Es como si los hubieran sacado de las profundidades de un pozo olvidado. Es... por la nave negra, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: あなたの周囲を耐えがたい重さの色が囲んでいます、マスター・ヴァン・キャロックス…まるで忘れられた深い井戸を掘り返しているかのようです。それは…〈黒き御船〉だからではないですか？」
languages.original_text: "You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: あなたの周囲を耐えがたい重さの色が囲んでいます、マスター・ヴァン・キャロックス…まるで忘れられた深い井戸を掘り返しているかのようです。それは…〈黒き御船〉だからではないですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid von unerträglich schweren Farben umgeben, Meister van Calox ... Es ist fast, als wären sie aus einem tiefen, vergessenen Brunnen hochgeholt worden. Es liegt ... an dem Schwarzen Schiff, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid von unerträglich schweren Farben umgeben, Meister van Calox ... Es ist fast, als wären sie aus einem tiefen, vergessenen Brunnen hochgeholt worden. Es liegt ... an dem Schwarzen Schiff, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"

languages.text: "Dayanması güç ağırlıkta renkler, dört bir yanını sarmış Üstat van Calox... Derin, unutulmuş bir kuyudan çıkarılmış gibiler. Kara Gemi'den ötürü, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
